name: LH Disable BP Registration
author: Peter Shaw

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to turn of or shutdown registration via Buddypress, without effecting other functionality.

I built this as I don’t like the way Buddypress does registrations but liked most of the rest, but you could use it if your site was full or invitation only for instance.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire lh-disable-bp-registration folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What is something does not work?

LH Buddypress Export Xprofile Data, and all https://lhero.org/ plugins are made to WordPress standards. Therefore they should work with all well coded plugins and themes. However not all plugins and themes are well coded (and this includes many popular ones).

If something does not work properly, firstly deactivate ALL other plugins and switch to one of the themes that come with core, e.g. twentyfifteen, twentysixteen etc.

If the problem persists please leave a post in the support forum: https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/lh-disable-bp-registration/. I look there regularly and resolve most queries.

What if I need a feature that is not in the plugin?

Please contact me for custom work and enhancements here: https://shawfactor.com/contact/
